name.ja: <ruby>闇と消滅の竜<rt>ダークエンドイヴァボレイション・ドラゴン</rt></ruby>

text.en:
You can banish 1 Level 8 Dragon monster from your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Dragon monsters. You can activate 1 of these effects;
● Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material.
● Target 1 other Attack Position monster on the field; this card loses exactly 500 ATK/DEF, and if it does, destroy the targeted monster.
You can only use each effect of "Dark End Evaporation Dragon" once per turn.
